value:
$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|We finally made it!
The Dream Gate.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|I don't smell Freyja's nightmares...
Now, Alfonse... Blow the horn while
we have the chance.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Right. Let's try it. Dream-King Freyr
told me to picture the world outside
the dream and wish to return...$k$pAnd with that desire in my heart,
to sound a blast on the horn.$k$pThen I need only to remember
my life before falling asleep,
put the horn to my lips, and...$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p*yawn*$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Nothing...happened...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|But...why? Mirabilis, did you fall
asleep on the way here and lead
us to the wrong place?$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No... This is the place.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Then, why... What am I doing wrong?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Is there nothing else we can do?
Other than run from nightmares
forever, that is...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Please wait... Let me think...$k$pIf I was doing something wrong,
where could I possibly err? $k$pI pictured the world outside the
dream, and I thought about my life
before falling asleep...$k$pIf what I suspect is true...then the
life I remember before the dream...
is not my life at all...$k$pAnd in fact, the me from my life
before the dream and the me from
within the dream...are separate.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...Pardon?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The commander said something
about how, in her dream, she was
a squirrel, and while in the dream...$k$pshe had no doubts about whether
she was a squirrel. It seemed
completely natural to her.$k$pAnd I realized that...while dreaming,
a person believes they are the person
in the dream without ev—$k$p$EFace_Anger|Who goes there?!$k$p$WmMPID_フード,ch00_29_Hood_N_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Oh! $Nu!
I'm so glad you—$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Prince Alfonse...$k$pSomething seems off about
this $Nu...$k$p

$WmMPID_フード,ch00_29_Hood_N_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What's wrong? Do you not recognize
us, $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I smell the nightmare on them...
Whoever they are, they're being
controlled by the nightmares!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Then we have no choice... We fight.
If luck's on our side, we can end this
with everyone still alive...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_フード,ch00_29_Hood_N_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...Unconscious. Good!
That means still alive.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Good...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|All right. Now, let's take this hood
off and maybe we can get to the
bottom of this...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It feels wrong to expose anyone
unconscious—and doubly so when
it's $Nu.$k$pBut under these circumstances,
I suppose we have no choice...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|I'm sure it will all be fine. Like you
said, nightmare circumstances!$k$pI just want to finally meet the one
and only $Nu!$k$pI've heard so much, and yet I have
no idea what you look like! So, now,
let's seeee...yooour face!$k$p$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|

$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Huh? Alfonse...$k$pAlfonse, what does this mean?
How are there TWO...Alfonse...es?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...$k$pNow I understand everything.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...Well, let's hear it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Why I'm laying here before us...
Why I can't remember meeting
Zacharias for the first time...$k$pAnd why I dreamt about the
World of Steel...$k$pIt's just like you said, Peony.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Like I said? ...When?
What do you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|In a dream, you can do whatever
you want. Anything is possible.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Oh, that's right. I did say that
before, didn't I!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Dreams are mysterious. You can
become someone else and do
impossible things...$k$pI am not Alfonse.$k$pI am having a dream of
being Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Whaaat?!$k$pThen...who ARE you?
Tell us your name!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス0,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|My name...$k$pis $Nu!$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_05,0|$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|$Fi3000|Ah... So you finally realized the
truth about yourself...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What do you know,
Lady Freyja!$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|This world could very well be entirely
of your own invention, with you as
the lone soul within it...$k$pI wonder...did you ever feel
like that as a child?$k$pIt may be that you alone are alive
and that everyone else is an empty
shell... Have you ever thought so?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス0,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|...Do you know WHY you are
having this dream? Allow me
to explain.$k$pThis is what you want. You wish
Prince Alfonse yet lived...$k$pSo you've dreamt a reality where
he can continue to live happily,
surrounded by friends and allies...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...What are y—$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|I don't suppose you CAN remember
what happened... If you could recall,
the dream would likely collapse.$k$pBe that as it may, the truth is that
this mortal you care so much for,
Prince Alfonse, defeated death...$k$pAnd with that, He Who Created
Everything, Alfaðör, has decided...$k$pPrince Alfonse could no longer
be allowed to exist.$k$pA decision made by the Creator
is absolute. His will is truth—and
as you know, truth is inescapable.$k$pYet here you are, fleeing...$k$pSoon you will have no choice but
to accept it. Prince Alfonse is gone.
You will never see him again!$k$p$Sbs150|
